Text.Language: hina n~te Pi,~rictoc Pennou] ]m~ton n~nou'u,/ t/rou qen piparadicoc n~te p~ounof: a~non de hwn n~teferpinai neman: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
that Christ our God may repose all their souls in the paradise of joy, and we too, accord mercy unto us and forgive us our sins.
